items.details:
Extra reading

For Chuseok, I have assigned some extra ReadWorks passages with stories about how people celebrate their culture. Please log in when you have time to practice and boost your reading skills.

 Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it

Reading
he story this week is 'Living in Deserts' 

Please watch the video until you understand the story.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NxDlziHeNdg 

The spelling words for Next Thursday are:

shield
lack
exposure
nomadic
landscape
extreme
drowned
heatstroke
protect
conditions
traditional 
climate
oasis
barren
pollution 

I have assigned a story on What Lives in the Deserts? (DUE LAST FRIDAY)

Please try your best to complete these assignments to help your reading grow!  Please answer every question and SUBMIT.

 Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it

Math

Complete Additional Practice 4-2

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Science

Read and complete 56-65 in the Science Textbook.

Watch the video to understand the lesson today.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OQG83UvXn3w 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dx3RpXdJw2k

Korean

Study for the test in the next class.

Chinese

There will be a Chinese Test in the next class.

Social Studies

Learn About Goods and Services

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jd4kD9TicbA

Take the goods and services quiz. How many did you get correct?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_CV7FWP5Oqo

 I have assigned a story on Readworks - Buying, Selling, and Trading

Go to www.readworks.org/student

Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it
